import React, { Component } from 'react' // import { Redirect } from 'react-router' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Glassdoor_logo from '../../Images/glassdoor-logo.svg' import './Navbar.css' class Navbar extends Component { constructor( props ) { super( props ) this.state = { dropDownValue: "Jobs" } } dropDownClick = ( e ) => { e.preventDefault() this.setState( { dropDownValue: e.target.value } ) } render () { return (
) } } export default Navbar;
